form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 443-R4005.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R400.5 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT FILE NO. APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: FEE STAMP 245 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act REC'D T/C OCT 16 1968 249, I&N Act Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 Immigrant Nonimmigrant Visa Issued at: Rio de Janerio on: March 27, 1968 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check appropriate box) An immigrant visa is immediately available to me: A. other than as a refugee B. as a refugee under the proviso to Section 203(a)(7) of the Act. I have resided in the United States continuously since C. prior to June 30, 1948 D. prior to July 1, 1924. 2. My name is (First) (Middle) (Last) My alien registration number is Yoh Han LEE A17 182 973 3. I reside in the United States at: (Apt. No.) (No. and Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 1801 Pandora Ave. Los Angeles Calif. 90025 4. Date of Birth Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) I am now a citizen of (Country) Jan. 9, 1914 Shanghai China China 5. I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) New York, N.Y. April 21, 1968 by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) as a (Visitor, student, U.S. citizen, stowaway, immigrant, etc.) PAN Am 202 Visitor 15:2 6. I am single Kmarried divorced widowed one a. I have been married times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) b. Number of times my spouse has been married C. Name of spouse one time Ming Lo CHIN d. My spouse resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (Town or City) (Province or State) (Country) 1801 Pandora Ave. Los Angeles, Calif. 90025 7. a. I have 6 children, as follows: (complete all columns as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of child's residence. O Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now Living at Toni LEE M China 9/13/1937 San Paulo, Brazil Katherine LEE F. Brazil 10/10/39 San Paula, Brazil Francis LEE M. Hong Kong 12/1/1941 Los Angeles, Calif. Teresa LEE Chai Li F China 9/2/1946 Los Angeles, Calif.c Francis Chai Pao LEE F. China 41464944 Los Angeles, Calif. Lee Caie ve LOS b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: Angeles, Cafif. Chai Pao LEE and Chai Li LEE my daughters 8. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None.") None 9. I have have not been charged with a violation of law (other than minor traffic violations). (If you have ever been charged with a violation of law, give date and place and nature of each charge and the final result., 10. I have have not requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States. (If you have ever requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States, give date and place of your request, the reason for such request and specify to whom it was made.) Form I-485 (Rev. 2-10-67) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service (Page 1)
